entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Local smoke this evening. Fog patches overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local smoke in the afternoon. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
